1.title: State of the Industry

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: The state of the motocross industry is in dire shape. Riders must drop out of school to succeed, teams are not making money, the sport isn't growing, and when riders get injured their livelihood is cut off. Kyle Chisholm, Tommy Hahn and Josh Grant are three riders whom have all considered retiring in recent years. For Kyle Chisholm, he does not have the money he needs to compete, Josh Grant is constantly suffering injuries, and Tommy Hahn is racing without a salary hoping his results will bring a future.

2.title: A Good Life

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Motocross has taken Davi Millsaps' kidney, consumed the last twenty years of his life, and strained his relationship with his mother. While the sport will strain both body and soul, Davi Millsaps finds more positives than negatives every day.

3.title: A Reason to Race

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: The state of the motocross industry is dire. Riders must drop out of High School to succeed, teams are not making money, the sport is no longer growing, and when riders get injured their livelihood is cut off. This season, "The Moto: Inside The Outdoors" holds a mirror to the industry and explores the highs and lows of being a part of the MX family. Josh Grant, Davi Millsaps, Nico Izzi, Kyle Chisholm, and Tommy Hahn all suffer for their sport while, Ryan Dungey dominates the 450 premier class. Dungey's victory deliveries a long awaited championship to KTM and team ...

4.title: Fill the Void

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: With four out of the top five riders injured this outdoor season, the sport needs someone to step up and fill the void. While a Championship may be unattainable for riders like Mike Alessi, Andrew Short, Broc Tickle and Jake Weimer, they all rely on their mentors to get them on the box.

5.title: Our Future

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: The state of the motocross industry is dire. Riders must drop out of High School to succeed, teams are not making money, the sport is no longer growing, and when riders get injured their livelihood is cut off. This season, "The Moto: Inside The Outdoors" holds a mirror to the industry and explores the highs and lows of being a part of the MX family. Josh Grant, Davi Millsaps, Nico Izzi, Kyle Chisholm, and Tommy Hahn all suffer for their sport while, Ryan Dungey dominates the 450 premiere class. Dungey's victory deliveries a long awaited championship to KTM and team ...

6.title: The Dream

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: In the last 3 years, Ryan Dungey has been the most consistent, focused outdoor rider in the world, but that is a statement he is forever trying to prove in his own mind. Roger DeCoster has ambitious goals for the sport and wants to work with companies that share his vision. In 2012, Dungey and DeCoster are reunited in pursuit of a championship and a dream.

1.title: The Battle Begins

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: We launch into the season with riders Ryan Vilipoto, Chad Reed, Mike Alessi, Justin Barcia, Ryan Dungey, Andrew Short and Tyla Rattray, following their training as they prepare for the grueling competitions ahead.

2.title: Father & Son

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Episode two showcases the most important 'team' in motocross: The Father and Son. We explore two racing families, the Alessi's and the Wharton's, who have two completely different approaches to winning.

3.title: Sport of Attrition

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Get a view into various grueling, training regiments as The Moto hits Texas and then onto Pennsylvania.

4.title: Our Destiny

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Mike Alessi injures himself and needs immediate surgery. But the Alessi's aren't out of the race as they stage an impossible comeback.

5.title: Grinding Down

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: See who's risen and fallen off. This is the point where champion's are made. The Barcias' fight through challenges of being on the road.

6.title: The Victors

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: "Wrap up of the 2009 MX Nationals. The Contenders arrive. We see who remains, who put in the work, and who it will all pay off for..."

1.title: Champions Are Built Not Born

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: The Alessi family reflects on last motocross season, 2009 champion Chad Reed fights to stay on top, and Ryan Dungy is fresh off his Supercross title win.

2.title: Paid to Win

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: The motocross 450 cc championship is anyone's game, Andrew Short needs to perform especially well this year, and newcomer Brett Metcalfe makes a name for himself.

3.title: A Family Affair

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: New fathers Ben Townley and Josh Grant split their time between competing in the outdoors and providing for their families.

4.title: Welcome to the Big Time

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Dungey is looking strong mid-motocross season and all of the 450cc riders are planning on how to beat #5. Some key riders are unable to finish the season.

5.title: Keep Fighting

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: With the championship title near Dungey's grasp, Brett Metcalfe and Andrew Short gear up to battle for second place overall in the 450cc Outdoor Series.

6.title: A Waking Giant

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Midway through the 250cc season it looks as if Christophe Pourcel, Tyla Rattray, and Dean Wilson will dominate this year. As Eli Tomac's rookie season fortune starts to fade, teammate Trey Canard becomes a force to be reckoned with.

7.title: Never Enough

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: With the championship title near Dungey's grasp, Brett Metcalfe and Andrew Short gear up to battle for second place overall in the 450cc Outdoor Series. Motocross veteran Kevin Windham makes a surprise return to the Outdoors and breaks records in Steel City.

8.title: Red vs Green

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: The battle for the 250cc championship is as close as ever. All American Trey Canard and world champ Christope Pourcel are now neck and neck in points, and any mistake made could cost them the championship. It all comes down to the wire at the final race at Pala raceway in the clash between Pro Circuit and Geico Powersports.

1.title: Hangtown National

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Whole seasons and, championship aspirations, can be lost in as little as a single practice run, while underdogs and title holders trade places on the podium, as the 450 outdoors motocross season gets under way in Sacramento, California.

2.title: Freestone National

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: The 450 Moto, sees Ryan Dungey and Chad Reed battle it out for the overall lead. Rookie 250 sensation, Blake Baggett, shows his toughness and determination in the Texas heat.

3.title: HighPoint National

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Along with fast starts, good conditioning, and over all speed, family is just as an important to winning in motocross.

4.title: Budds Creek National

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Tyla Rattray loves the heat. Broc Tickle looks to prove his worth. Kevin Windham continues to succeed despite his aging body and concerned family. All this and more come to a head at Budd's Creek.

5.title: Thunder Valley National

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: KTM hired Rodger DeCoster away from the dominant Suzuki team to win a championship. In a show of support, his mechanics and technicians followed him into the unknown. With Mike Alessi's early season injury KTM's aspirations for a win are gone. KTM is forced to look to next year to finally win a championship that has eluded the dominant European bike company in America.

6.title: Red Bud National

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: The battle for first in the 250 class rages on as Dean Wilson, Tyla Rattray, and Blake Baggett go blow for blow in both motos.

7.title: Spring Creek National

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: The racing world lost one of its own last week at Redbud. Josh Lichtle passed away from heat stroke complications. He was 23 years old.

8.title: Washougal National

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: The two former champions deal with failure and living in the shadows of their more successful teammates. Trey Canard looks to capitalize on momentum only to suffer another injury. While Jake Weimer just wants this forgettable season to end.

9.title: Unadilla National

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Tyla Rattray looks to gain ground on teammate and rival Dean Wilson, but a crash jeopardizes his championship aspirations. Andrew Short deals with on and off-the-track issues that make his season struggle.

10.title: Southwick National

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: The treacherous conditions at Southwick end one rider's championship run, put another rider in jeopardy, and provide a glimmer of hope for the future of another rider.

11.title: Steel City National

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: In the most dramatic Moto of the year, Ryan Villopoto beats Ryan Dungey on the last corner of the race. In the 250 class, a champion is crowned.

12.title: Pala Raceway

episode of.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: With the 450 Class Outdoor Championship on the line, Ryan Dungey takes on Ryan Villopoto and his 14-point lead at Pala Raceway. Dungey has more than the championship on his mind with a potential team change looming after the season.

imdb.title: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors
akas: The Moto: Inside the Outdoors (United States)
plot: Every summer, the world's top motocross racers come together for the grueling 12-race AMA Outdoor Motocross Championship Series to battle the heat, the tracks and each other. These are just a few of their stories.::Tomlin, Shon
